name: Car simulator (pouso)
description:
Car simulator

Hi there! My name is Alejandro García and I am going to introduce you to this simulator I made.
Controls
Press W/S to accelerate and break
Press A/D to steer
Press Spacebar to jumpPress R to Reset the car
Press Shift to boost and drift

In the air you can:
Roll (Q/E)

Rotate in the X axis (Left/Right arrow key)

Rotate in the Y axis (Up/Down arrow key)


Hope you all enjoy the game and have fun playing it <3
